weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am frozen water.
🧤 You can make snowballs with me.
🏂 Some people like to play in me.

weather.question: I make the trees dance, but you can't see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can blow leaves around.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I am air moving.

weather.question: I'm yellow and hot, and I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give you light.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am very bright.
🌻 Flowers like me.

weather.question: I am wet and fall from the sky. You need an umbrella when I come by. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can fill puddles.
☔ I make everything wet.
🌱 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
☁️ You can see me on a sunny day.
🌧️ Sometimes I am grey and full of water.

weather.question: I am a flash of light and a loud noise in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come with thunder.
⛈️ I happen during a storm.
💡 I am very bright.

weather.question: I'm loud and scary, and I come after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I make a booming sound.
🌧️ I come during a storm.
👂 Cover your ears when you hear me.

weather.question: I am made of ice, and I fall from the sky like rain, but I'm hard. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you.
⛈️ I usually fall during thunderstorms.
🥶 I am very cold.

weather.question: I’m a colorful arc that appears after it rains. You can see me in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
☘️ Some people believe there's gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I can be very hot, but I'm not the sun. I can burn you, especially in summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 You need sunscreen to protect yourself from me.
🏖️ I can make you feel very uncomfortable at the beach.
🥵 I come from the sun but I'm its powerful effect.

food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 📏 I am often curved, not straight.
💛 My color matches the sun.
🐒 Monkeys like me

food.question: I am round and red, juicy and sweet. Sometimes I'm used in pies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🍎 Snow White ate one.
🔴 My color is the color of fire trucks.

food.question: I am white and you drink me with cookies. Moo! What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I come from a cow.
🦴 I am good for your bones.
🍪 I go well with sweet treats

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
🐇 Bugs Bunny eats me.
🧡 I am the color of pumpkins.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. Sometimes kids don't like me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable.
🫛 I grow with friends
🟢 I am the color of grass.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am baked in an oven.
🥪 You can put ham and cheese on me.
🌾 I am made from a grain.

food.question: I am long and thin and often served with red sauce. You twirl me on a fork. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I am a type of pasta.
🇮🇹 I am a food from Italy.
🍅 I taste good with tomato sauce.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 My name is also the name of a bird.
🇨🇳 I originally came from China.
🟢 My insides are green

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have layers.
🍔 You might find me on a burger.
😭 I can make your eyes water.

food.question: I am a treat that is cold and sweet. I come in many flavors and you often eat me in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am kept in the freezer.
🍧 I am often eaten in the Summer.
👅 I can be vanilla, chocolate, or strawberry.
